# Accessibility Commitment

I am committed to ensuring that this website is accessible to all individuals. My goal is to meet or exceed Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA wherever possible.

# Features for Accessibility

- Clear and consistent page structure using semantic HTML
- High color contrast for readability
- Keyboard-navigable interface
- "Skip to main content" link for screen reader users
- Descriptive link texts and accessible labels
- Responsive design for all devices

# Need Help or Found an Issue?

If you experience any accessibility barriers or have suggestions for improvement, please contact me:

- **Name:** James Salamon  
- **Email:** james.a.salamon@gmail.com  
- **Subject:** Website Accessibility Feedback

Your feedback is appreciated and will help make this website more inclusive for everyone.
